name: Saffron Tech
tagline: Web and Mobile Application Development Company
description:
Saffron Tech is a full-service Web, Software Development, and Mobile Application Development company with offices in the New York area and India, serving global clientele for over 10 years. Our expertise in services range from Custom Website Design and Development, Portal Development, Ecommerce Development, Native and Hybrid mobile application development to the latest technologies like PHP, Wordpress,.Net, iOS, Android, and Xamarin etc.
With almost a decade of experience behind us, we have perfected our development process. Our command of various technologies, agile methodology of development, and working with industry leading tools enable us to create scalable web and mobile solutions for our clients. Our goal is always to be an extension of our client’s business and provide innovative solutions for their technology requirements by meeting expectations in quality and timely delivery.
 
Call us now at +1 (315) 642-4730or Fill the Contact Form and our business consultant will get in touch.
 
Our sales process includes:
1. Submit Project Requirement to us
2. Business Analysis of Project Scope
3. Brainstorming Business Solutions with Client and Analysis team.
4. Proposal Submission
5. Contract Closure
